g.text: Hunspell - Regression Testing (speed, memory and correctness)
run hunspell with affix and dictionary on wordlist
accumulate speed, memory usage and correctness
of speed, memory usage and correctness
append speed, memory usage and correctness
and their min. and max. to results.tsv for hostname
checksum not in results.tsv for current hostname?
generate graph with restults.tsv for hostname
graph for hostname not existing or outdated?
